channel.title: ARWSC Website Source
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I am thinking off to make a Runescape Private Server Website Source for you guys. This will be free to download and it will be a 100% full working website. I will make it al included in an config.php, in the config.php you can change the site name in one click. It will change your website name on all page´s so you only need to download it, put it online and change the server name and you´re done!
The source will contain every needed stuff that an RPS needs.
But i am asking myself 1 thing. Do you guys like this? Or is this not needed? And if so, what you guys will like? So i can put it in the source?
Killea,
*****EDIT*******
I didn't told much about the source, it wil have: *A Runescape layout *Poll system (with admin) *News system (with admin) *Webclient *Rules page *Shop page (with admin) *Forum *Chatbox *Highscores (like real RS)
And more!! It will be al scripted by me, and only me. So no free forums like PHBB, or free chatboxes. It will be full php/SQL/html.
Greetz..

item.description:
@Killea wrote:

marcbob:

sounds like you are going to advertise that site on this site.

No, it will be a source to DOWNLOAD.
